EmailTemplate.description: Advise Customers It will take 3 to 6 Months
EmailTemplate.name: BP: Thank You for Your Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Gift Agreement for Custom Rack Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your bike rack request.
SFMTA will survey the location and if feasible install bicycle rack(s).
Installation generally takes 4-6 months from the time of request. Please use the REPLY TO in this email. This will automatically link every correspondence to your request.
Thank you,
Bike Parking San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency SFMTA
